router.logging
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  router.logging.Logger
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConsoleLogger, FileLogger, HybridLogger
public abstract class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

The Logger class defines a general logger.

          Create a Logger with the specified router ID
